::Cutthroat::

Cutthroat: Now you fight too?  Harr, die!

Cutthroat did a 1=
80 degree spin to the side, and the shot missed him.  Then, he took his gun=
 and fired 3 shots at Blot.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulsti=
ce Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 10:30=
 PM
  Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


  OOC:=
 4 shits? Hehehe.

  BIC: Blot: Blot be maaaad! No fightsing!

  Blot fires=
 his slime gun at Cutthroat...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From:=
 LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 20=
01 9:48 PM
    Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets=



    ::Cutthroat::

          Cutthroat, being a copycat, and not wanting=
 to lose an advantage, also transformed to robot mode.  He stood still, and=
 the 4 shits hit him in the chest.  He looked a little dumbfounded for a mo=
ment, then whipped out his gun and shot 4 shots back at Hun-Grr.

    OOC: =
Ok, I just said gun 'cause I don't know what weapons Cutthroat has in robot=
 mode.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Alloran2@... 
  =

 =
